Mi trabajo principal consistía en velar: My main job was to ensure the proper functioning of the CallCenter's call and reporting system, resolution of technical problems and daily reports.
Hola, mi portafolio online utiliza algun: Hello, my online portfolio uses some cookies to improve and optimize the content that I want to show you. Don't worry, you can go back to modify your configuration from the footer of this website whenever you want.
Estas cookies garantizan el buen funcion: These cookies guarantee the proper functioning of my online portfolio, they are used to perform vital functions such as security and navigation. For that reason they are mandatory.
Esta cookie es usada por Google Recaptch: This cookie is used by Google Recaptcha, it is necessary for the security and integrity of my online portfolio.
Esta cookie es usada por mi portafolio o: This cookie is used by my online portfolio to remember your decision about the use of cookies and adjust the website to your data privacy settings.
Esta es una cookie de seguridad para fir: This is a security cookie to sign the cookie policy cookie.
Esta cookie es usada por Google Analytic: This cookie is used by Google Analytics to distinguish users and allows me to store the number of times my online portfolio has been visited.
Son aquéllas que le permitirán acceder a: They are those that will allow you to access my online portfolio with some predefined characteristics and that depending on the characteristics of your device and / or browser, they will serve to offer a better service, they serve for example to configure the language, to adapt the content to the browser / device you are using, to save your regional configuration, etc.
Esta cookie propia de mi portafolio onli: This own cookie of my online portfolio and serves to remember the language you configured.
En este proyecto, he desarrollado un mód: In this project, I have developed an online payment module for Prestashop 1.7.x and 8.0.x, The module connects with the Easypay payment gateway through its API, which gives merchants the possibility to offer various payment options to their customers. The module supports different payment modalities, such as MBWAY, credit card, debit card, bank transfer and ticket. In addition, I have implemented an additional functionality that allows users to subscribe to certain products. This function is configured from the administration panel, which allows generating automatic periodic payments according to the established configuration. A highlight is the flexibility it offers to users. Even after the selected payment method during the purchase process has expired, users still have the option to cancel their subscriptions, cancel payments or retry the payment of their orders. This online payment module offers a comprehensive and reliable solution for Prestashop, providing a smooth and convenient shopping experience for both merchants and customers. I am sure it can be a valuable addition to any online business.
He creado una tienda online dirigida al: I have created an online store aimed at the general public, with a main focus on computer products for gamers. The store design is modern and attractive, and for its development I have used the CMS Prestashop 1.7. In order to improve the functionality of the store, I have developed some custom modules. For example, I have created a real-time search module using AJAX, which allows users to get instant results as they type in the search field. In addition, I have created a special module to extend the functions of promotions, allowing the merchant to set new rules and features for product promotions. I have also developed a special module for product packages, since the base version of Prestashop did not offer the necessary features to meet the merchant's needs. In addition to these improvements, I have made optimizations in the performance of the store and I have implemented a custom product filter system, different from the one that comes by default in Prestashop. This allows users to quickly find the products they want, making their shopping experience easier. In short, this online store that I have developed offers an attractive and functional shopping experience for users interested in computer products, especially focused on the gamer world.
He desarrollado una tienda online dirigi: I have developed an online store aimed at the general public, with a special focus on the sale of food products. However, the main objective of this store is to control the distribution of merchandise to the different physical stores of the company. The store design is modern and attractive, and for its development I have used the CMS Prestashop 1.7. In order to guarantee an efficient control of the distribution of merchandise, I have developed some special modules. For example, I have created an internal module that allows the merchant to apply various filters and generate files in Excel and/or PDF format. These files provide the merchant with an organized view of the daily distribution of merchandise that must be carried out in each of the physical stores, based on the orders placed by the administrators of each store. These special tools provide the merchant with an efficient way to manage and understand the distribution of merchandise, facilitating coordination between the different physical stores and optimizing the logistics process. In short, this online store that I have developed focuses on the sale of food products and is specially designed to control the distribution of merchandise to the company's physical stores.
Cuentas Corrientes de Primavera - Módulo: Cuentas Corrientes de Primavera - Prestashop Module
He desarrollado un módulo para Prestasho: I have developed a module for Prestashop that integrates easily with the ERP Primavera. This module shows the outstanding accounts and current accounts by customer, facilitating the follow-up of financial information. In addition, it offers the option to download the invoices generated by the Primavera software directly from the Prestashop administration platform. Likewise, the module allows the download of an Excel file with the data of the current accounts of the clients, providing an organized and accessible vision of the accounting information. This module provides an efficient solution for financial management in Prestashop, by allowing a seamless integration with the ERP Primavera and facilitating access to key data quickly and easily.
He desarrollado una aplicación (APP) par: I have developed an application (APP) for the control of internal processes related to the company's operations. This application facilitates the creation of simple forms so that the workers in charge of reporting the information can load the data and register it in the database quickly and easily. During the development of this APP, we have used various technologies to meet the specific needs of our client in terms of security and functionality. As a result, we have complemented the application with an API that I have developed. This API is responsible for updating the forms, receiving the information sent through them, storing the data in the database, sending emails, managing notifications and performing other necessary functions. The combination of the application and the API guarantees an efficient and secure process for the control of the company's internal processes.
He desarrollado una tienda online utiliz: I have developed an online store using Prestashop that allows the sale of products both by weight and by unit. Since Prestashop does not offer native functionalities for this type of purchases, and I did not find any developed module that met these requirements, I created a custom module from scratch. This module extends the functions and views of Prestashop to meet the specific needs of the client in this aspect. In addition, the online store has a modern and attractive design, which is compatible with mobile devices and is optimized for SEO. This ensures an optimal user experience and better visibility in search engines.
